metadata.title: Medical Students and Pandemic Infl uenza

abstract.original_text: To assess knowledge of pandemic infl uenza, we administered a questionnaire to all medical students at the University of Alberta; 354 (69%) of 510 students responded. Data from questionnaires such as this could help determine the role of medical students during a public health emergency.

sentences.segment_text: To assess knowledge of pandemic infl uenza ,
we administered a questionnaire to all medical students at the University of Alberta ; 354 ( 69 % ) of 510 students responded .
Data from questionnaires such as this could help determine the role of medical students during a public health emergency .
